sub_topic: Probability of a certain type of political event occurring in a country
message_1: What is the probability that a randomly selected voter in a certain country has a positive opinion of the prime minister if 60% of the population approves of their performance?
message_2: The probability that a randomly selected voter in a certain country has a positive opinion of the prime minister, given that 60% of the population approves of their performance, is 60% or 0.6.
